"Echo":
"So this is the Tunnels, huh?
Wow, it's just as creepy as they said it would be!"

"N-No! I'm not s-scared! It's just, being extra
vigilant in unexplored territory is what any
sensible ARKS member would do."

"Okay, let's get on with this. Well, go on.
You first. I have you covered from behind."

"Oh, and remember, we're mainly here to
take a look around, but if we pick up a
distress signal, we've got to go help."
